thread.section_title: Constant Contact Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Constant Contact | www.constantcontact.com
thread.title: George Sunday
thread.title_full: Constant Contact reviewed by George Sunday

author: George Sunday
title: George Sunday
text: We have been using constant contact for about 7 years now and though I would not say they have drastically improved over the years, they are trying. I find that the handling of contacts and helping remove contacts is something they can do better. Ours is a Children's play center, so as the children get older the client is not going to be interested anymore, unless they have a second child, so the ability to remove emails based on entry date is something that might be a good option. I know that we can remove emails addresses that do not open by sorting through open email list, but it is time consuming anyways I started digressing. Its a good service, pricey? but what is not now a days!
